detail_desc: Dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt. Unlined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg. Chest pocket with a glittery text print, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and frayed hem.
Paper straw hat with a twisted band around the brim and paper straw pompom at one side. Width of brim 5 cm.
Short shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and colourful side stripes.
Knee-length dress in viscose twill with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short sleeves with pleats and cuffs, a seam under the bust and elastication at the back of the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jersey top in a silk blend with stitched seams front and back.

Playsuit in plumeti chiffon made from recycled polyester containing glittery threads. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and concealed press-stud at the front. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip in one side and long puff sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam and a detachable belt with a heart-shaped, beaded buckle at the waist, and a small frill trim at the hems. Jersey lining.
Long down jacket in woven fabric with a large collar, concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers.
Vest top in slub linen jersey with a V-neck, low-cut back and gently rounded hem.
Soft cotton jersey leggings in different designs with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short sleeves, a tapered waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Cropped top in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Raw-edge hem. Lightly brushed inside.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey with elastication and a flounce at the top.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with front pockets and no buttons.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft viscose jersey.
Round sunglasses with patterned plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective, mirrored lenses.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace. One of the chains is decorated with leaf-shaped pendants and the other has a round pendant. Adjustable length 40-47 cm.
Short skirt in cotton twill with a high waist and wrapover front with concealed buttoning in the waist band and a wide, detachable belt. Patch pockets with a flap. Unlined.

Blouse in an airy, printed weave with a round neck with a V-neck opening and ties at the front and long raglan sleeves with a flounce down the sides. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and smocking at the hem. Unlined.
Suede shoes with lacing, fabric linings, leather insoles and chunky rubber soles.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Jumpsuit in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the top and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Gathered yoke at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist with a tie, side pockets and wide, straight legs. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a wide belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and fake back pockets. Wide, tapered legs with creases.
Slip-on trainers with fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Tailored trousers woven in a stretch cotton blend with a concealed zip in the side and fake back pocket. Straight tapered legs with creases and short slits at the hems.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Set with a blouse, pair of leggings and a hairband. Blouse in a cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce around the neckline, and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in cotton jersey with a decorative bow at the front and elastication at the back.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets and wide legs with slits.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, patterned knit with long sleeves and no buttons.
Cardigan in a soft, fine cotton knit with long raglan sleeves, buttons down the front, fake front pockets and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jersey tops in a soft cotton blend. Slim fit.

Ankle boots in imitation suede with pointed toes, kitten heels and an elasticated shaft. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 5 cm. The polyester content of the ankle boots is partly recycled.
Short, imitation leather dress in a boxy style at the top with a tapered waist. Collar, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and long, voluminous sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.

Short dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening with a concealed button at the front and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist, a decorative belt with a metal buckle, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Pull-on trousers in cotton corduroy with elasticated ribbing at the waist and hems. Fake fly, side pockets and one back pocket. Jersey lining.

Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable, fleece-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, welt front pockets with a press-stud, and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains in various designs, one with a pendant and one with plastic beads. Adjustable length, 42-49 cm.
Short-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey with gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Set with a top and dungarees in soft organic cotton. Jersey top with short sleeves and press-studs on one shoulder. Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with adjustable straps and elastication at the back of the waist. Kangaroo pocket with appliqués, concealed press-studs at the crotch, and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short V-neck dress in airy chiffon with short butterfly sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and a lace trim at the hem. Lined.
Jacket in soft fleece with contrasting colour details, a stand-up collar and mesh-lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and zipped front pockets. Unlined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from cotton and recycled polyester. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in velour with a low waist and half-string back.

Trousers in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and flap leg and back pockets with concealed press-studs. Concealed drawstring at the hems. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a small fabric appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
Shirt in a checked cotton weave with buttons down the front and at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Imitation leather sandals with square toes, narrow straps and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Heel 5 cm.
Top in softly draping, ribbed jersey with a sheen. Narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck at the front and a lace trim at the top.
Cropped top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, straight cut at the back and narrow shoulder straps.
Straight-style top in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, and contrasting colour trims and side stripes.
Short, chunky metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 40-48 cm.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Cutaway collar, French front, yoke at the back, cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Scarf in a patterned weave. Size 130x130 cm.
Trousers in stretch jersey with a glossy finish. High waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs.
Wide V-neck blouse in a viscose weave with short sleeves and buttons down the front.
Short pattern-weave skirt in a linen blend with a wrapover front, concealed pockets in the side seams and detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Concealed drawstring at the waist, and flap chest and front pockets with press-studs. Lined.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with gathered seams in the sides for a gentle draped effect and a high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Hair scarf in an airy, patterned weave that can be tied around the head or neck. Size 16x22 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit with a lightly brushed finish, long raglan sleeves, lacing at the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Boxy top in jersey with a soft brushed finish. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Flounces with an overlocked edge around the shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Outdoor jacket with light padding front and back in woven fabric, a lined hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and side sections. Partly lined.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with short, puff sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. 3/4-length leggings with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
